Catalog_Raisonne: Hollstein 1 iii; Bartsch 1 (vol. 1, p. 351); Dutuit (vol. 3) 1 iii; Godefroy 1 iii/iv (third state has engraved borderline and monogram at right)
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York; sold June 11, 1984, to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Bust of a Laughing Peasant
